results.description: Nottingham Forest sign 25-year-old goalkeeper Brice Samba from French Ligue 2 club Caen.
results.title: Brice Samba: Nottingham Forest sign goalkeeper from French side Caen

results.description: The French league is investigating "doubts about the integrity" of Caen's Ligue 1 home defeat by Angers after a complaint by Guingamp.
results.shortTitle: French league look into Caen-Angers game
results.title: French league investigate Caen's loss to Angers after Guingamp complain

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores twice as Ligue 1 leaders Paris St-Germain come from behind to beat Caen - and go 20 points clear.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe scores twice in PSG win
results.title: Kylian Mbappe scores twice as PSG come from behind to beat Caen

results.description: Caen and Nantes pay tribute to their former striker Emiliano Sala during their Ligue 1 match on Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Caen and Nantes pay tribute to Sala
results.title: Emiliano Sala: Caen and Nantes pay tribute to their former striker

thumbnail.altText: Tributes to Emiliano Sala outside Caen's Stadium

results.description: Thierry Henry claims his first victory as Monaco boss, thanks to Radamel Falcao's second half free-kick at fellow Ligue 1 strugglers Caen.
results.title: Caen 0-1 Monaco: Radamel Falcao free-kick gives Thierry Henry first win as boss

results.description: Neymar is on target and Timothy Weah scores his first league goal, as Paris St-Germain started their Ligue 1 campaign with a 3-0 victory over Caen.
results.shortTitle: Neymar goal leads PSG to 3-0 Caen win
results.title: Neymar: Paris St-Germain striker scores as his side open Ligue 1 season with 3-0 win over Caen

results.description: Follow live coverage of Crotone v Juventus and Real Madrid v Athletic Bilbao, plus updates from Caen v PSG in the French Cup semi-final.
results.shortTitle: European football: Ronaldo scores late equaliser for Real Madrid
results.title: European football: Real Madrid losing to Athletic Bilbao

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores one and assists another on his 19th birthday as Ligue 1 leaders Paris St-Germain beat Caen.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 3-1 Caen

results.description: Radamel Falcao keeps up his phenomenal scoring start to the season as Ligue 1 champions Monaco beat Caen.
results.title: Monaco 2-0 Caen

results.description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
results.shortTitle: Five-year wait over for Real Madrid?
results.title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

thumbnail.altText: Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane (left) and Barcelona boss Luis Enrique

results.description: Striker Kylian Mbappe scores twice to take his Ligue 1 goal tally to nine in his past seven games as leaders Monaco beat Caen.
results.title: Caen 0-3 Monaco

results.description: Follow live text commentary as Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich visit Borussia Monchengladbach.
results.title: Bundesliga: Borussia Monchengladbach v Bayern Munich

results.description: Edinson Cavani scores twice as champions Paris St-Germain end a three-game winless run in all competitions to thrash Caen.
results.title: Caen 0-6 Paris St-Germain
